channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Zelensky says Trump wants Russia-Ukraine peace deal by June, before midterms focus

item.title: More people are treating themselves to a solo meal
item.description: Solo dining orders have soared since 2021, according to a report by one of the world's largest restaurant companies. Why it matters: Eating alone does...

item.title: Scoop: White House plans Board of Peace meeting in D.C. on Gaza reconstruction
item.description: The White House is planning a leaders meeting for the Gaza " Board of Peace " on Feb. 19, according to a U.S. official and diplomats from four countri...

item.title: Trump says "I didn't make a mistake" after racist video of Obamas removed
item.description: When asked if he would apologize for an overtly racist video clip of the Obamas posted on President Trump 's Truth Social, the president said Friday, ...

item.title: John Phelan, Trump’s Navy secretary, listed in Epstein flight logs
item.description: Documents indicate that Navy Secretary John Phelan was a passenger on Jeffrey Epstein’s Boeing 727 for two transatlantic flights in 2006.

item.title: Adam Schiff is a leader of Democrats’ opposition to Trump. He also has to govern.
item.description: Six years after leading Trump’s first impeachment trial, Schiff reflects on the balance Democrats must strike between opposing Trump and lawmaking.

item.title: Trump refuses to apologize over video showing the Obamas as apes
item.description: “No, I didn’t make a mistake,” the president said.

item.title: Alleged key participant in 2012 Benghazi attack brought to U.S. to face charges

item.title: Trump in Iowa tries to shift the conversation back to the economy
item.description: A brief swing through the farm state underscored administration fears about the midterms.

item.title: Americans give Trump low marks on handling of economy as midterms likely to center on affordability
item.description: Sixty-one percent of voters told a CNN poll released Friday that they disapprove of the way Trump is handling the economy.

item.title: Capitol agenda: Trump tests GOP with Fed probe
Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
